body:
So everyone biggest question is this gay? 
Riko like being fuck as a girl but when he turned back he was disappointed and he like to have more sex but that when he was a girl but now he is a boy. So is he/she/it gay?
Damn I never thought Rito would be so hot.
Hyogetsu's drawing has progressed so much! Compared to the works in which he/she first started with Riko, this is much sexier.

Riko then immediantly transforms back into a woman. It turns out that yuu's semen only caused riko to fall in love with yuu. Mikado sensei simply wanted riko tp find a boyfriend. After another few hours of yuu holding riko's legs up and continually pounding her, spanking her, rubbing her boobs, and licking her belly button, riko permanently remains a girl. She now loves yuu romantically and pervertedly. She becomes yuu's girlfriend, has yuu buy  underwear for her, sleeps with yuu every night in his bed. She now acts like momo, to which she constantly wants to marry yuu, rubbes her boobs and her large butt against him, dresses in an open button up shirt with panties and no bra as her pajamas whenever theyre in bed. Yuu, always loves to tease riko, either by kissing her out in public, and groping her boobs, to which he bangs her whenever they are intimate, especially when riko is in her pajamas and in bed.
Theyre the perfect couple! Make one where riko is permantly a girl
Would be better if Gid found out that Rito's girl form is also his type.
